body:
I think the asymmetry is justified here. The deleter deletes a pointer to a supervisor; this function makes a supervis**ed** pointer. `makeInefficientStdFunctionSupervisedPtr` also has the correct c++ naming convention, in line with `std::make_shared`

Maybe the nomenclature is bad. Happy to do a search-replace rename.
